00020 #include "HgeTexture.h"
00021 #undef max
00022 
00023 // Start of CEGUI namespace section
00024 namespace CEGUI
00025 {
00026 
00027    /*************************************************************************
00028    Constructor
00029    *************************************************************************/
00030    HgeTexture::HgeTexture(Renderer* owner) :
00031    Texture(owner)
00032 {
00033    m_hgetexture = NULL;
00034    hge = HGE::hgeCreate(HGE_VERSION);
00035 }
00036 
00037 /*************************************************************************
00038 Destructor
00039 *************************************************************************/
00040 HgeTexture::~HgeTexture(void)
00041 {
00042    freeHgeTexture();
00043    hge->Release();
00044 }
00045 
00046 /*************************************************************************
00047 Load texture from file.  Texture is made to be same size as image in
00048 file.
00049 *************************************************************************/
00050 void HgeTexture::loadFromFile(const String& filename, const String& resourceGroup)
00051 {
00052    freeHgeTexture();
00053 
00054    m_hgetexture = hge->Texture_Load(filename.c_str());
00055    m_width = hge->Texture_GetWidth(m_hgetexture);
00056    m_height = hge->Texture_GetHeight(m_hgetexture);
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 /*************************************************************************
00061 Load texture from raw memory.
00062 *************************************************************************/
00063 void HgeTexture::loadFromMemory(const void* buffPtr, uint buffWidth, uint buffHeight, PixelFormat format)
00064 {
00065    //using namespace std;
00066 
00067    freeHgeTexture();
00068 
00069    // calculate square size big enough for whole memory buffer
00070    uint tex_size = std::max(buffWidth, buffHeight);
00071 
00072    // create a texture
00073    m_hgetexture = hge->Texture_Create(tex_size, tex_size);
00074 
00075    // store new size;
00076    m_width = hge->Texture_GetWidth(m_hgetexture);
00077    m_height = hge->Texture_GetHeight(m_hgetexture);
00078 
00079    //DWORD color = locked_ptr[y*tex_width+x];
00080    DWORD *locked_ptr = hge->Texture_Lock(m_hgetexture);
00081 
00082    if(locked_ptr)
00083    {
00084       ulong* src = (ulong*)buffPtr;
00085       for (uint y = 0; y < buffHeight; ++y)
00086       {
00087          for (uint x = 0; x < buffWidth; ++x)
00088          {
00089             locked_ptr[y*m_width+x] = src[x];
00090          }
00091          src += buffWidth;
00092       }
00093 
00094 
00095       hge->Texture_Unlock(m_hgetexture);
00096    }
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 /*************************************************************************
00101 safely release hge texture associated with this Texture
00102 *************************************************************************/
00103 void HgeTexture::freeHgeTexture(void)
00104 {
00105    if (m_hgetexture != NULL)
00106    {
00107       hge->Texture_Free(m_hgetexture);
00108       m_hgetexture = NULL;
00109    }
00110 
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00114 /*************************************************************************
00115 allocate a hge texture >= 'size'.  Previous hge texture is lost
00116 *************************************************************************/
00117 void HgeTexture::setHgeTextureSize(uint size)
00118 {
00119    freeHgeTexture();
00120 
00121    m_hgetexture = hge->Texture_Create(size, size);
00122     m_width = hge->Texture_GetWidth(m_hgetexture);
00123    m_height = hge->Texture_GetHeight(m_hgetexture);
00124 }
00125
